metadescription: Web application designed to help people that have ran into problems with their computer
noAccount: Don't have an account yet? clik here
alreadyAccount: Already have an account? clik here
strongerPassword: Password needs to have at least 8 characters one digit, one lowercase and uppercase letter

invalidCredentials: Incorrect email or password, try again or reset the password
